name: SANKURYU DOG SHIT COLLECTOR
description:
SANKURYU DOG SHIT COLLECTOR

(Windows game for download)

You play as a Karate master who collects dog shit in his bag while exploring the land and while you explore the strange streets you will have to find a secret switch that will open up a special door that will take you to fight your worst enemy. Along the way, you will find interesting messages, places kickable flying dog shit and meet up with your K9 friend Mille the dog as well as get some exercise. Will you make it to the top and get your reward?

CONTROLS 

"W"=Foward

"A"=Turn left

"D"=Turn right

"S"=Backup

"SPACE"=Start the game

NOTES: 

Visuals in the game are for mature adults only

On completion of the game, one must start again by exiting and restarting it or else one will be only able to explore the world and continue collecting shit and or explore the land endlessly

There is a small glitch where you may find yourself stuck between the mesh of the SECRET DOOR if you walk up to it at a certain angle in which case you will have to restart the game if this happens
